title: Under the Cluster DevelopmentPlan (CDP) for the concerned area, to be prepared by the Commissioner,
clause_text: Under the Cluster DevelopmentPlan (CDP) for the concerned area, to be prepared by the Commissioner, who may revise the same as and when required; or Under the Development Plan (DP), where the DP contains such well- defined cluster
section: 33(9) Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster(s) of Buildings under Cluster Development Scheme(s)(CDS):

source_pdf.text_snippet: Under the Cluster DevelopmentPlan (CDP) for the concerned area, to be prepared by the Commissioner, who may revise the same as and when required; or
